title: Can You Get Ultra Rare Skins in Hextech? (Black Alistar, Urfwick, PAX, etc)

replies.body:
No you can't, the skins that you list are limited skins and cannot be unlocked.

Legacy skins however can be unlocked since they come out of the vault every now and again anyways.

This page has more info: 
https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752944-Guide-to-Legacy-and-Limited-Skins

You can get Legacy skins, such as Unmasked Kayle, Hextech Sion, Professor Ryze - http://leagueoflegends.wikia.com/wiki/Champion_skin/Retired_skins

But you cannot get limited access skins like PAX TF, human ryze and seasonal rewards.
yes u can get them cuz u can get all skins in hextech, even the ultrarare
No, you cannot get all skins in hextech. Any limited skin will be unavailable through hextech crafting, just as they are unavailable through mystery gifts.
If you can get it in a mystery box, you can get it from Hextech. (So to answer you specific examples: no, you can't get those)
I got a legacy skin (workshop nunu) so idk if that counts.
